thread.title: Fantastic holiday
thread.title_full: Fantastic holiday - Review of Four Points by Sheraton Midtown - Times Square, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: onbinon
title: Fantastic holiday
text:
All hotel staff were so helpful, we asked lots of questions as it was our first time in New York it was amazing so much to do on your doorstep, Times Square is a few blocks away from the hotel. It was clean and the food was amazing well worth going there.
Room Tip: All rooms look as if they got a great view. See more room tips
